reviews.text: Limited trains stop here! And it is just a small platform, nothing else there!
Not a very good station, no facilities and not many trains stop here.
One of the nicest stations in the Wigston area. Excellent views of trains. Helpful staff and a good range of shops. Good connections for Paris

At the moment trains don't run regularly every hour from this station.  Plus it's expensive too compared to other stations outside Leicestershire boundary. The train to Birmingham is usually over crowded and it is difficult to find seats especially at peak times.  No idea why they don't add extra carriages and lower the ticket prices because it just discourages people from using it.  Cost for a single anytime ticket from South Wigston to Hinckley is over 11 pounds for a 13 minute trip.
Near enough abandoned train station. Train station that time has forgot
